table.name: vtiger_vgsdynamicblocks
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vgsdynamicblocks` ( `vgsdynamicblocksid` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `moduleid` int(19) NOT NULL, `fieldname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `fieldvalue` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `blockid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vgsdynamicblocksid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
